name: Image Gallery Block
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Want to showcase your images using a beautiful gallery layout? Use this Image Gallery plugin for block editor & showcase images on your WordPress.

You can easily use this block plugin in Gutenberg and grab the attention of your potential customers or visitors using a stunning image gallery.

‚öôÔ∏è Completely Customizable: You can customize the images, size, colors, etc to make it suitable for your website design

‚ö° Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Image Comparison”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload image-gallery-block to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.3.4 – 09/04/2024

  • Fixed: compatibility support with wordpress 6.5 version
  • Improved: controls

1.3.3 – 11/01/2024

  • Added: Select option to set default display filter in Image Gallery block
  • Fixed: Image Gallery Block right side gap issue
  • Improved: Controls

1.3.2 – 06/06/2023

  • Added: Image alt text
  • Improved: Controls

1.3.1 – 22/03/2023

  • Improved: Font loader and Controls

1.3.0 – 04/12/2022

  • Added: Category Filter support
  • Fixed: Image Gallery lightbox animation issue with Twenty Twenty Two theme & Twenty Three Two theme
  • Improved: Controls

1.2.3 – 26/09/2022

  • Added: Feature Request – Image Height Width control and Image Size selection option in Image Gallery Block

1.2.2 – 30/08/2022

  • Fixed: Image Gallery lightbox not loading external images
  • Fixed: Image Gallery Masonry design issue with Twenty Twenty Two theme
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.1 – 31/05/2022

  • Added: Responsive control, animation and custom CSS options
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.0 – 09/02/2022

  • Fixed: Block Base theme support
  • Improved: Font Library Updated
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.1.0 – 13/09/2021

  • Added: Dynamic asset generation for inline styles
  • Added: Responsive control
  • Added: Color Overlay Style
  • Added: Margin, Padding, Background, Border & Shadow controls for block wrapper
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.0.1

  • Fix: Missing css, js files

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
